name: Studio Run
description:
This game was made for a university assignment where I had to make a video game within a week. You are running through a motion capture studio collecting coins and Power-Ups.

Controls:

A:     Move Left

D:     Move Right

Q:     Turn Left

E:     Turn Right

Space: Jump

P:     Pause

Controller Support:

Left Thumbstick:     Move Left/Right

Left Shoulder:        Turn Left

Right Shoulder:        Turn Right

Face Button Bottom: Jump;

Special Right:         Pause

Power-Ups:

Clapperboard Power-Up: 15m/s speed boost for 100 coins, lasts for 10 seconds

Light Power-Up: Invulnerability from fallen over LightStands for 10 seconds
